_description: Classroom desk layout configuration for Yahoo Robot
_layout_notes: 2 tables with 2 chairs each (4 desks total)
Chairs positioned at table ends, behind tables
Origin positioned in gap, pointing forward toward desks
Robot path: Origin -> D1 -> D2 -> D3 -> D4 -> Origin

origin.description: Starting position in gap between tables, facing forward

_desk_distance_note: Distance from origin to desk line (Y-axis). MEASURE THIS and update!

desks.name: Desk 1 (Left of Table 1)
desks.description: Leftmost desk, left end of Table 1

desks.name: Desk 2 (Right of Table 1)
desks.description: Left of gap, right end of Table 1

desks.name: Desk 3 (Left of Table 2)
desks.description: Right of gap, left end of Table 2

desks.name: Desk 4 (Right of Table 2)
desks.description: Rightmost desk, right end of Table 2

scan_angles._note: Angles for desk-centric polling. Robot turns to these angles to face each desk.
scan_angles._calculation: Based on desk_distance_forward_cm=100. Will update when distance measured.

navigation._note: Speed and distance settings for navigation

stop_points._description: Fixed 5-stop point path planning system for row navigation
stop_points._note: Stops are evenly spaced at 60 inches apart. Stops 0-3 correspond to desks 1-4. Stop 4 is buffer for 180Â° turn.
